All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
HelpMojo
Display help information on sigstore-maven-plugin.
Call mvn sigstore:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
JarSign
Goal which: generates ephemeral key pair gets OIDC token and associated email requests code signing certificate from sigstore Fulcio signs the JAR file (with jarsigner) publishes signed JAR file (that contains the signature per JAR signing spec) to sigstore Rekor
SigstoreSignAttachedMojo
Sign project artifact, the POM, and attached artifacts with sigstore for deployment.
